section.p: This template records the intent to supply a patient with medications.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7429, CONF:1098-10507, CONF:1098-32578 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medication Supply Order template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7432), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32362)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-7434)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7442, CONF:1098-7444, CONF:1098-31391)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-7439, CONF:1098-16093)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Immunization Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-9334, CONF:1098-31695)
A supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information (V2) or one product/Immunization Medication Information (V2) template (CONF:1098-16870)
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7445)
SHALL conform to Medication Supply Order template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7427, R2.0=CONF:1098-7427)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="INT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7428, R2.0=CONF:1098-7428)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Order Number) (CONF:7430, R2.0=CONF:1098-7430)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-7432), which SHALL be selected from ValueSet ActStatus 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.159331 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32362)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Order Expiration Date/Time) (CONF:15143, R2.0=CONF:1098-15143)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (CONF:1098-7434)
In "INT" (intent) mood, the repeatNumber defines the number of allowed administrations. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" means that the substance can be administered up to 3 times. In "EVN" (event) mood, the repeatNumber is the number of occurrences. For example, a repeatNumber of "3" in a substance administration event means that the current administration is the 3rd in a series.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (Quantity Ordered) (CONF:7436, R2.0=CONF:1098-7436)

MAY contain [0..1] author (Ordering Provider) such that it (CONF:7438, R2.0=CONF:1098-7438)
Conforms to Author from CDA

MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-7442, CONF:1098-7444, CONF:1098-31391)
Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ
Conforms to Instruction2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20:2014-06-09)
entryRelationship with target entry Instructions if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7445)
effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high (CONF:15144, R2.0=CONF:1098-15144)
supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information or one product/Immunization Medication Information template (CONF:16870)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.23:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-7439, CONF:1098-16093)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] product such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] Immunization Medication Information (V2) (identifier: urn:hl7ii:2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.54:2014-06-09) (CONF:1098-9334, CONF:1098-31695)
A supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information (V2) or one product/Immunization Medication Information (V2) template (CONF:1098-16870)
entryRelationship with target entry Instruction2 if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:1098-7445)

body.codeblock: <supply xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="SPLY" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="1442609114"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime value="20170828"/> <repeatNumber value="1"/> <quantity/> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT" moodCode="INT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="871348374"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> </supply>

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7429, CONF:10507 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.17"
Consol Medication Supply Order entryRelationship with target entry Instructions if present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="true" True (CONF:7445)
Consol Medication Supply Order effectiveTime SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] high (CONF:15144, R2.0=CONF:1098-15144)
Consol Medication Supply Order supply act SHALL contain one product/Medication Information or one product/Immunization Medication Information template (CONF:16870)
SHALL conform to CDA Supply
Consol Medication Supply Order SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="SPLY" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:7427, R2.0=CONF:1098-7427)
Consol Medication Supply Order SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="INT" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:7428, R2.0=CONF:1098-7428)
Consol Medication Supply Order SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (Order Number) (CONF:7430, R2.0=CONF:1098-7430)
Consol Medication Supply Order SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:7432)
Consol Medication Supply Order SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (Order Expiration Date/Time) (CONF:15143, R2.0=CONF:1098-15143)
Consol Medication Supply Order SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] repeatNumber (Fills) (CONF:7434)
Consol Medication Supply Order SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] quantity (Quantity Ordered) (CONF:7436, R2.0=CONF:1098-7436)
Consol Medication Supply Order MAY contain [0..1] author (Ordering Provider) such that it (CONF:7438, R2.0=CONF:1098-7438) Conforms to Author from CDA

Consol Medication Supply Order MAY contain [0..1] entryRelationship (Patient Instructions) such that it (CONF:7442, CONF:7444, CONF:16095) Contains @typeCode="SUBJ" SUBJ, and Conforms to Instructions (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.20)
